entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Async io never completes in .net 6 #69377
  • tracing/eventpipe/eventsvalidation tests failing with AF: codeLength > 0 #69375
  • Azure DevOps is down - all CI jobs failing #69374
  • MemoryMappedFile slow program termination #69365

Closed

  • `dotnet.exe` doesn't uniquely identify duplicate resolved SDK paths #69371
  • Interop\StringMarshalling\UTF8\UTF8Test failing in outerloop #69349
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Support ref fields in `System.Reflection.Metadata.Ecma335.BlobEncoder`. #69378
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Remove CngKeyLite #69376
    area-System.Security
  • Move constants to the right when canonicalizing commutative operations in VN #69368
    community-contribution
  • Only fold Type.op_Equality calls before morphing args #69367
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update signing of JS files #69366
  • Allow convert from pointer to pointer #69364
    area-System.Linq.Expressions, community-contribution
  • Add `IntPtr` conversion APIs for some runtime handles #69363
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Fix UTF8 string marshalling regression #69360
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Revert "Add IL Emit support for MethodInfo.Invoke() and friends" #69373
    area-System.Reflection
  • Fix typo in 'parameter' #69370
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • Implement constant-folding for `VNF_BitCast` #68979
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Run host tests with dotnet test and enable crash/hang dumps #69340
    area-Host
  • Fix ProcessorCount calculation on Windows 11 #68639
    area-System.Threading
  • Fix for GetMemberWithSameMetadataDefinitionAs #69284
    area-System.Reflection
  • [MONO][DRAFT] Factor marshal-lightweight out of marshal-ilgen #69208
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/6.0] Prevent debugger deadlock with code versioning logic #68367
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Restore FP pairs when unwinding in ARM64 #69359
    Servicing-consider
  • Use intrinsic for genLog2() #69333
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add more char.Is* helpers for common ASCII sets #69318
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fix ASAN violation under Samsung's netcoredbg #69339
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Improve Interop.Sys.ReadLink loop with stackalloc #69335
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • hostpolicy: As a fallback, try to resolve mangled stdcall symbols on win-x86. #67813
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Redhawk to NativeAOT #69227
    community-contribution
  • Adding Int128 and UInt128 with a base software implementation #69204
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Allow source generation for classes with ignored init-only props #69327
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Add AppContext data support for DefaultMaxConnectionsPerServer #68952
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Deleting field sequences from `LCL_FLD` and `VNF_PtrToArrElem` #68986
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Hoist the invariants out of multi-level nested loops #68061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use SubtleCrypto API on browser DOM scenarios #65966
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix debug proxy when used with blazor #69342
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • runtime: add RIDs for anolis distro #66132
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • build macOS (Arm64) Run: segmentation fault #25440

Closed

  • Single EXE build takes minutes to launch, self contained build launches in seconds #25371

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-15
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: Semi-Auto-Properties; `field` keyword #140
    Working Set
  • FeatureRequest: Support XML Comments on local methods #2110
    Any Time

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Red "ignored" icon next to all analyzers through project reference #61336
  • "Extract base class" shouldn't be the first item in the light bulb #61334
  • Version Microsoft.CodeAnalysis 4.2.0 doesn't work #61333
  • Call to DeconstructionInfo.Nested causes System.InvalidCastException: Unable to cast object of type 'UncommonData' to type 'DeconstructionUncommonData'. #61332

Closed

  • Add 'Current Member' scope for fix-all code action #30375
    Backlog
  • `not` not appearing after `and`/`or` in pattern. #61184
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Better completions in generic constraints #61335
    Area-IDE, Community

Merged

  • Show not keyword (and all other stuff) after and & or when they are treated as identifiers #61306
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • [LSP] Disable GoToDef/GoToImpl integration tests #61190
    Area-IDE, Integration-Test, LSP, Next
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #61331
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61330
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #61329
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/required-members #61328
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #61327
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • [LSP] Support LSP services associated with LSP server instances (with lifetimes that match). #61266
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Keep leading trivia inside Main method… #61178
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Allow creating SourceText from a StringBuilder #61251
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Ref fields escape analysis #61195
    Area-Compilers
  • [semi-auto-props]: Rename ContainsFieldKeyword, revise cases that should handle FieldKeywordBackingField #61310
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • ignore top level statements from move static member refactoring #61227
    Area-IDE, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Setup script, .env file support in launchSettings.json #41690
  • IdentityUser Primary Key #41689

Closed

  • Unable to read appsettings using appcmd.exe #41596
  • Setting User Token Reminding Attempt #41662

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable trimming on remaining middleware and security projects #41688
    area-security, area-runtime

Updated

  • Add Request Decompression middleware #40279
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Enable trim analyzer #41683
    area-infrastructure
  • Improve gRPC JSON transcoding request binding and support HttpBody #41523
    area-grpc

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-15

Issues

Updated

  • dotnet-counters renders incorrectly in certain situations #3036
  • Dotnet-trace in container does not collect full stack information #3051
  • EventPipe sample profile: missing thread state information #3060

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Graphics engine desktop #7212
  • Border clipping issue #7211
  • [BUG] Label with FormattedText ignores FontSize #7210
  • Adding new shadow property to frame no working #7209
  • Accent color can't be overwritten like in WinUI 3 #7208
  • [Windows] MauiIcon Color and TintColor doesn't work in taskbar and is inconsistent elsewhere #7207
  • [Android] MauiIcon Color and TintColor doesn't work #7206
  • [Documentation] Only really working and tested examples in documentation #7205
  • [Android] my custom svg icon is always black on Android #7204
  • [Android] Icon shows default android image when ForegroundFile in MauiIcon is not set #7203
  • [Android] Icon not found if called something else than appicon #7202
  • [Windows] App icon doesn't show in window title #7201
  • [Windows] App Icon behaves randomly #7200
  • Including Microsoft.Identity.Client in .net Maui project causes it to fail to build when ios is targeted #7199
  • When the title set to string empty place for title is still exist #7198
  • Close button - not close the app in window. #7197
  • Content Page- Disappearing event not fire again #7196
  • MainActivity's OnCreate throws System.IO.FileNotFoundException #7195
  • (Blazor Hybrid) CSS Min Map files do not load #7194
  • MediaPicker.PickPhotoAsync() messes up my Binding #7193
  • MAUI WebView on Android not loading Cesium static web page. #7191
  • Shell navigation with C# types (no serialization) for MAUI Blazor #7190

Closed

  • XLS0414: The type ' ' was not found. Verify that you are not missing an assembly reference and that all referenced assemblies have been build. #7192

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Possible bug with relations loading (foreign key) #28029
  • Client-side parameter transformations #28028
  • Cosmos Db First query always shows very slow performance compared to subsequent queries. #28027
  • ChangeTracker's StateChanged event's changes not being updated #28026

PullRequests

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Force NullabilityInfoContextSupport=true in user projects #27916
    Servicing-consider
  • Attribute for configuring DeleteBehavior #27630
    waiting-for-response
